short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize and filter your browsing history with Surfed. Surfed respects your privacy and ensures that your data stays on your device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your unified browsing history across browsers with a powerful search.
Surfed is a powerful companion for browsing.

Organise your links and browsing history with Surfed, your personal search engine for your history and links.
With Surfed, finding visited websites has never been easier and faster.

Never lose track of a visited website or interesting link again. Surfed helps you keep your browser history, bookmarks, and links organized.

Surfed is a Safari history and bookmark manager, as well as a web automation tool. Search and filter your browsing history using multiple search terms and full-text search.

Surfed stores the browsing history of all visited websites in Safari, allowing you to search through the history using various metadata and find the desired web pages faster and more accurately. Recording the history also enables you to create dynamic lists of visited websites, track browsing activity statistics, and get an accurate overview of all sessions.

Quickly search your history or bookmarks using multiple search terms.

This extension only works on macOS in combination with Surfed after installing the Surfed extension helper.
